com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPCheckBox

java.lang.Object
  CheckBox
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPCheckBox

public class WPCheckBox
extends CheckBox

In order to maintain compatibility with standard Android functionality WPCheckBox is very simple, it only implores a custom Drawable that is a solid color square background and two lines to form a check.

Change Log:

  • Scaled by density.

Since:
16-03-2012
